Production Co: Newmarket Capital Group, Greenlight Fund, Goldwyn Films
Sound Mix: Dolby Digital, Dolby A, Dolby SR
Synopsis: The lives of the Victorian Era operatic composers Gilbert and Sullivan. Takes place during the original composition of the 1884 staging that would be one of their most famous works, "The Mikado." During this time they were anything but a sure thing, and this movie depicts how they turned things around.
Title: Topsy-Turvy
